Class PreferenceChangedEventArgs

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Models.Events
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Event arguments for preference change notifications. Provides data about which preference was modified and its new value.

public class PreferenceChangedEventArgs : EventArgs
Inheritance
object
EventArgs
PreferenceChangedEventArgs
Inherited Members
EventArgs.Empty
object.Equals(object)
object.Equals(object, object)
object.GetHashCode()
object.GetType()
object.MemberwiseClone()
object.ReferenceEquals(object, object)

Examples

// Suscribirse al evento
settingsService.OnPreferenceChanged += (sender, args) =>
{
    if (args.Key == PreferenceKeys.Theme)
    {
        ApplyTheme(args.NewValue);
    }
};

Remarks

This event args class is used by OnPreferenceChanged to notify subscribers about preference modifications in real-time.

Subscribers (typically UI components) can use this information to:

  • Update UI immediately without polling
  • React to specific preference changes (e.g., theme change)
  • Log preference modifications for audit purposes
  • Synchronize settings across components

This class is immutable to prevent accidental modification after creation. All properties are get-only and set via constructor.

Constructors

PreferenceChangedEventArgs(string, string)

Initializes a new instance of the PreferenceChangedEventArgs class.

public PreferenceChangedEventArgs(string key, string newValue)

Parameters

key string

The preference key that changed.

newValue string

The new value of the preference.

Exceptions

ArgumentNullException

Thrown if key is null or empty.

Properties

Key

Gets the preference key that was changed.

public string Key { get; }

Property Value

string

Remarks

This should match one of the constants defined in PreferenceKeys. Example: "theme", "auto_mark_as_read", "notification_enabled"

NewValue

Gets the new value of the preference.

public string NewValue { get; }

Property Value

string

Remarks

Values are always stored as strings, but can be parsed to their target types using the helper methods in PreferenceHelper.

Methods

ToString()

Returns a string representation of the event arguments for logging.

public override string ToString()

Returns

string

Formatted string with key and new value.
